featured.text: After a spa treatment at Happy Puppy, dogs come home 16 pampered and relaxed.
According to the passage, which of the following is NOT used in health spas? (A) Magic power.
The third kind is called “health spas,” or “faith healing.”

definition.zh_def: 水療中心，提供按摩、護膚和放鬆的服務。
definition.en_def: A place where people go to receive therapeutic treatments, such as massages and skin care, for relaxation and health.
definition.example: After a long week at work, I decided to treat myself to a day at the spa.
